p: The expanding popularity of MR has facilitated its critical evaluation and steady improvement ( Burgess et al., 2015 , 2018; Holmes et al., 2017 ; Hemani et al., 2018 ), and initiatives such as the UK Biobank, Million Veterans Program and 23andMe ( https://research.23andme.com/, last accessed 9 April 2020) provide genetic data for a wealth of phenotypic traits ( Gaziano et al., 2016 ; Bycroft et al., 2018 ). In addition, guidelines have been produced to standardize the reporting quality of MR studies ( Burgess et al., 2019 , Davey Smith et al., 2019 ).
